name: rolled newspaper
description: Literally just a few pages of newspaper rolled up to hit things with. Why would you use this? At least the headline about rising violence rates is amusingly ironic.

name: newspaper with rock
description: A newpaper wrapped around a rock and bunched up at the other end. Why are you like this?

name: Millwall Brick
description: A bunch of rolled up and folded newpapers to use as a bludgeon. Popularized by the supporters of the Millwall Football Club.
